technology.title: HTML5
technology.text: HTML5 serves as the foundation for structuring and presenting content on the web, offering enhanced semantics, multimedia support, and interactive elements.

technology.title: CSS3
technology.text: CSS3 plays a crucial role in styling and designing web pages, providing advanced layout options, animations, and responsive design capabilities for improved user interfaces.

technology.title: JavaScript
technology.text: JavaScript is essential for adding dynamic functionality to web applications, enabling DOM manipulation, event handling, and asynchronous communication with servers.

technology.title: Nuxt 3
technology.text: Nuxt 3 is a powerful framework built on Vue.js, used for creating modern and high-performance server-side rendered (SSR) and static websites with streamlined development workflows.

technology.title: Vuetify 3
technology.text: Vuetify 3 is a comprehensive UI library for Vue.js projects, offering pre-designed components, themes, and responsive design features to enhance user interfaces.

technology.title: React Native
technology.text: React Native is utilized for developing cross-platform mobile applications using JavaScript and React, enabling efficient code sharing and native app experiences on iOS and Android.

technology.title: WordPress
technology.text: WordPress serves as a versatile platform for creating dynamic websites and blogs, providing customizable themes, plugins, and content management tools for easy publishing and management.

technology.title: GitHub
technology.text: GitHub plays a pivotal role in code collaboration and version control, facilitating efficient code management, collaboration among developers, and project tracking.

technology.title: Vuex/Pinia
technology.text: Vuex and Pinia are state management libraries for Vue.js, offering centralized state management, data sharing, and reactive updates to streamline application development and maintain data consistency.

projects.title: xDock
projects.text: xDock is a powerful platform that simplifies distribution and logistics by connecting drivers with cross-dock facilities, warehouses, and storage points across the country.

projects.title: Blue ridge suppliers
projects.text: A one-stop shop offering a wide range of high-quality building materials tailored to meet the unique needs of contractors and construction professionals.

projects.title: Serve Freight
projects.text: ServeFreight is a digital platform that connects shippers with top-tier carriers to ensure fast, reliable, and cost-effective transportation solutions.

projects.title: Patton cap
projects.text: Patton Cap specializes in crafting custom homes throughout Western North Carolina, delivering quality construction and personalized service for every client.

projects.title: Jump Cup
projects.text: JumpCup transforms your daily coffee run into an adventure with bold flavors, unique drinks, and a vibrant customer experience you’ll want to repeat.

projects.title: Xcold
projects.text: Xcold offers specialized cold chain logistics with expert temperature control and monitoring for perishable goods, ensuring freshness and safety.

projects.title: Zelh
projects.text: Zelh helps businesses scale by building remote teams, optimizing operations, and handling administrative tasks so clients can focus on growth.

projects.title: Zelh AI
projects.text: Zelh AI solves complex operational challenges through custom solutions that combine automation, AI, and human expertise to accelerate results.

projects.title: Zelh Logistics
projects.text: Zelh Logistics provides tailored staffing and outsourcing services for logistics companies, helping streamline workflows and reduce operational costs.

projects.title: Zelh Academy
projects.text: Zelh Academy offers career guidance and professional training programs designed to help individuals grow and succeed in the logistics industry.

projects.title: Zelh Tech
projects.text: Zelh Tech blends strategy, technology, and design to deliver high-impact digital solutions — from MVP launch to full-scale product growth.

projects.title: Logistics Zelh Tech
projects.text: Logistics Zelh Tech supports freight brokerage companies with scalable growth tools, tech integrations, and process automation tailored to the industry.
